sentences.sContent: I play basketball every week with friends.
sentences.sCn: 我每周都和朋友打篮球。

sentences.sContent: In the afternoon, we play basketball or tennis.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the afternoon, we play basketball or tennis.
sentences.sCn: 下午时，我们打篮球或者网球。

sentences.sContent: I used to go play basketball with some of my friends every Saturday afternoon.
sentences.sContent_eng: I used to go play basketball with some of my friends every Saturday afternoon.
sentences.sCn: 以前我和一些朋友每星期六下午都去打篮球.
